question:
You rent an apartment and recently a new neighbor has moved in who lives above you. They are making a lot of noise and this is disturbing you.

Write a letter to your landlord. In your letter: 

Explain what the problem is
Explain why it is disturbing you so much
Tell your landlord what you would like him/her to do about it
text: I am writing this letter with  great pain and regret to inform you about the huge sound which is coming from your flat and putting us into an uncomfortable state of mindset. Therefore, we would like to bring it to your notice since before it gets worse and push us into a problem.

As you heard, it's been a long time since we did not have proper bedtime due to this noise. Furthermore, the entire family is struggling at the workplace as we do not have proper rest at our home. We feel like we are in hell and sometimes it is leading to serious health issues with bass sounds  I even see that our windows are getting shaking and they may get a break if this not going to get stopped.

However, undoubtedly, this has to get stopped immediately without any second thought, if not I am ready to file a complaint in our community as we already paid for the damage and we cannot wait anymore and handle this bigger noise at home.
I look forward to seeing good cooperation from you and hoping this issue will not happen again in our society.
